itemAcquisitionFlags.sourceDescription: Steal from Crawler (Lake Macalania - Blitz Loss)

content.actionText: Mega Phoenix, else Phoenix Down Rikku
Overdrive Lv. 2 Key Sphere and Lightning Marble

itemAcquisitionFlags.sourceDescription: Rikku OD Mix (Lv.2 Key Sphere + Lightning Marble) vs Crawler

content.text: Walk into the wall to the right of Tromell
Move slightly to the right, turn around and Talk to Tromell while moving Right.
If successful, walk forward while mashing Shelinda's dialogue.
When dialogue finishes, walk up the stairs, push the man, and go through.
If Shelinda is not saying her dialogue, talk to one of the musicians

content.text: On Tidus' 4th turn switch him for

content.actionText: Phoenix Down Rikku if she died before Multi-Thundara.

content.text: You need 21 Power Spheres and 10 Speed Spheres
, exit Fayth room. Make sure that the Save Sphere touch is done
the above Sphere Grid, otherwise you will die to Wendigo.
Take sphere from the right wall, place into pedestal
Take Glyph sphere from middle pillar
Go downstairs and push pedestal to the right
Place Glyph sphere in far left slot in the wall
Go upstairs, pick up new sphere
Go downstairs, place sphere in pillar
Go upstairs, take the sphere at the top of the slope
Move south and go down the left path.
Try to not get caught by the Guados chasing you, if you get caught Flee
Intentionally get caught by a Guado, kill the enemies to gain AP on Tidus

trackedResourceUpdates.name: SilenceGrenade
trackedResourceUpdates.description: Rikku uses Silence Grenade on Guado encounter (Blitz Loss)

content.actionText: Spiral Cut Wendigo, then Attack it until it's dead
Steal from Guado if everyone is at full HP, otherwise switch to Lulu
Elixir Tidus/Phoenix Down dead character/Steal from Guado/Defend

content.text: and go to the hidden area to

itemAcquisitionFlags.sourceDescription: Chest in Lake Macalania hidden area
